title: Lot Of 13, T212 Obaks, All Stamped "Gilliam Squires" - SOLD
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: Lot Of 13, T212 Obaks, All Stamped "Gilliam Squires" - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I hate to sell these off, but I need the funds for something else.  Shown is my small Gilliam Squires collection of 13 T212 cards.  These range from Good to VG-EX.  A couple were graded SGC 50 but I broke them out.  I'd really like to keep these together and sell to someone who has interest in pursuing more of them.  Here's a nice chance to get a bunch at once.  I'm asking [STRIKE]$600.00[/STRIKE] $[STRIKE]550.00[/STRIKE] $450.00 OBO for them.  Paypal preferred.  I will ship Priority with insurance.
